summary: The diff clearly implements an always-column layout for the Journal filters container and adds a responsive Mood/Energy row that becomes two columns at >=540px. However, the diff is truncated before showing the Date From/To row and the Search/Clear overflow fixes, so those requirements cannot be confirmed. The diff also includes modifications to files outside the allowed scope (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json), which were not requested and violate the constraint to apply layout changes only to the selected element/container.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Date From and Date To inputs always share a single row with two columns regardless of screen width (including below 540px), without stacking vertically.
missing_requirements.reason: The JournalFiltersDropdown.tsx diff is truncated before any Date From/Date To layout code appears, so there is no evidence the date inputs were placed in an always-two-column row across all breakpoints.

missing_requirements.requirement: Prevent horizontal overflow of filter controls (notably the search input and Clear button) on small screens by adjusting sizing/wrapping rules inside the selected container while keeping the existing controls and order.
missing_requirements.reason: The shown portion only covers the outer container and the Mood/Energy row. The diff is truncated before Search/Clear layout details, so overflow-prevention changes for those controls cannot be verified.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified repository summary/metadata file frontend-file-summaries.txt, which is unrelated to the requested Journal filters container layout change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constrains layout changes to only the selected element/container in frontend/src/components/JournalFiltersDropdown.tsx; changes to this summary file are not requested.
BuildRequest does not request updating project tracking/state files and explicitly constrains changes to the selected Journal filters container in JournalFiltersDropdown.tsx.
